page.title: 02Winster village facilities
page.content: The Post Office is a room in Holly Cottage in the centre of Winster village, where usual sub-post office business is transacted. General news is also avialable, certain items of food can be obtained, also soft drinks and ice-cream. There are four kiosks in the valley all painted red and easily found, but not obtrusive in the landscape. The instrument in the "Brown Horse" may be used by courtesy of the staff in the bar but it is not a pay phone. It is usually apparent when a house has its own, and most of the private houses have one, and also the farms, many of which have an outside bell.
